message.body: Hello. How's your day going?
Hello, it's going pretty good so far how about you?
It's alright. Always tired on Monday morning!
Did you have a good weekend?
Yeah I went home to the town I grew up in to see my dad for Father's Day. How about you?
That's nice. I should have gone to see my dad, but I didn't get to.
Do you live close to where you grew up?
Do you live far from him?
I live about three hours from where I grew up so it's not too long of a trip
Not too far, about 2 hours. But I don't have a car right now so I have to take the train
Did you go out to dinner or something?
Ooh yeah I have to take the train sometimes too, it's no fun.
We went to see man of steel and grilled some steak for dinner
Yeah that's kinda why I didn't go ... It's expensive and takes forever
Superman and steaks, sounds fun!
Hahah yeah superman was okay, it looked really cool but the last half of the movie was basically one long fight scene, it got a little drawn out
Yeah, I will probably wait til it's on Netflix to watch it
Sometimes modern action movies have too much of that rapid edit stuff ... Gets annoying
Good idea, I love Netflix. I don't even use cable anymore
Yeah and there was a ton of cgi effects which is cool but after a while its like, I've seen t before...
Cable is so expensive, they need to make it cheaper
They're jus encouraging illegal downloading!
I know! It's so expensive, and just so much easier to watch shows online
I prefer tv series to movies, I get kind of impatient watching movies
Unless they're really good
Yeah me too and I feel like there really haven't been that many decent movies come out recently either
I liked the hobbit
I liked the hobbit too, I haven't seen The Lord of the rings movies so I wasn't as excited for it as others but I really liked it
What?! You need to watch them all tonight! I love them
Hahah I know everyone has the same reaction when I tell them and I don't know why I never saw them I really do need to watch them!
They are some of my favs
I never saw titanic, everyone says the same about that
Hahah yeah that's surprising i don't think I've ever met anyone who hasn't seen that movie! I haven't seen it in a while though
